abstract: China Southern Airlines led carriers’ gains in Hong Kong Thursday, after the aviation regulator expressed support for consolidation and overseas acquisitions, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: China Southern Airlines led carriers’ gains in Hong Kong Thursday, after the aviation regulator expressed support for consolidation and overseas acquisitions, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: China Southern Airlines led gains by air carriers in Hong Kong markets on Thursday, after an aviation regulator expressed support for consolidation and overseas acquisitions, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: China Backs Overseas Acquisitions by Airlines

abstract: General Motors will halt Hummer production next week at its Louisiana plant until sale of the brand to a Chinese company is completed.
snippet: General Motors will halt Hummer production next week at its Louisiana plant until sale of the brand to a Chinese company is completed.
lead_paragraph: General Motors will halt Hummer production next week at its Louisiana plant until sale of the brand to a Chinese company is completed, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: G.M. to Halt Hummer Production Pending Sale

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Hummer Division of General Motors Corp
